sentences.en: Finally, people like to stereotype. This is an inferential process based on limited data.
sentences.cn: 最后, 人们喜欢刻板地给人“穿靴戴帽”, 这是基于有限的资料所做的推理.

sentences.en: In this article I will focus on data collected using a nominal scale of measurement and the inferential techniques appropriate for nominal data.
sentences.cn: 在本文中，我将主要讨论通过使用测量的定类尺度收集的数据，以及适用于定类数据的推论技术。

sentences.en: It can give an objective account of the inferential nature of human communication.
sentences.cn: 它能客观地描述、解释交际过程中的推理过程.

sentences.en: The bottom tray usually is not the best place to make an inferential measurement of composition.
sentences.cn: 一般说来,盘子的背面并不是用来推断构成成分的最佳位置.

sentences.en: The validity of inferential form is the key conception of logic.
sentences.cn: 推理形式的有效性是逻辑学的核心概念.

sentences.en: There might be a market for inferential power like that, especially if it could be yoked to some of the autonomous semi-intelligent agents that are already buzzing around on the Internet.
sentences.cn: 如果像那样的话，推论力也可能有市场，尤其是如果它能跟一些在互联网上已经流传开的、自发的半智能力量结合在一起时更可能有市场。

sentences.en: This paper is an attempt to give inferential reasoning and solution to thin film vibration equation.
sentences.cn: 试图对薄膜振动方程加以推导和求解.

sentences.en: This paper presents an intelligent point temperature scanning - monitoring system based on the fuzzy - inferential decision.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了一种基于模糊推理决策的智能化多点温度巡回监测系统.

words.tran_cn: 推理的；推论的；根据推理的

trans.tran_cn: 可以推论的，据推论得出的
trans.tran_en: of, relating to, or derived from inference
